oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A note referring to !nanni's drawing of the |kui fruit, which describes how it is eaten and prepared when ripe and unripe. 1) See !nanni's drawing of 16 October 1880 (NLLB_D_!n070), 2) This story is found in Book XI.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !nanni's drawing of the |kui
